name: Harsh Singh
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Netflix Clone Website
projects.description: Constructed a responsive Netflix clone website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, mimicking the UI/UX of the original platform for seamless user interaction.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Built a Machine Learning Model that Recommends which Movies they need to watch on their Past Interest or searched by the User.

projects.name: Data Analysis Dashboard Previewing Sales Insights
projects.description: Designed and implemented a Data Analysis dashboard showcasing key sales metrics and trends. Visualized sales data using interactive charts and graphs, facilitating strategic decision-making.

experiences.description: Engineered interactive to-do list application leveraging Vue.js and Vuex, enhancing user task management with seamless state management and real-time updates. Designed and implemented portfolio website showcasing projects with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, optimizing for responsive design and user-friendly navigation. Conducted thorough code reviews and implemented optimizations to ensure efficient functionality and seamless integration of new features across the application.

Developed predictive models for car sales, titanic survival, and credit card fraud detection using Python and machine learning algorithms. Implemented data preprocessing techniques to clean and transform datasets, ensuring high-quality input for accurate predictions. Evaluated model performance through metrics such as accuracy, precision, and recall, refining algorithms for optimal predictive outcomes.

full_output.name: Harsh Singh
publications: S. Singh, H. Singh, I. Hussain, and A. Manglik, Data Analysis Dashboard Previewing Sales Insights, 2024 under the guidance of Prof. (Dr.) Arjun Raj and Prof. Shakeel Ahamad.
